description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the installation failure of the January 2024 Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) update due to partition size limitations:

1. Increase the size of the WinRE partition to accommodate the update. The required additional space is 250 megabytes.
2. Follow the guidance in KB-5028997 for detailed instructions on manually resizing your partition to install the WinRE update.

**Details**:
- This action is necessary to prevent the error message *'0x80070643 - error_install_failure'* during installation. 
- Ensure that the WinRE partition is properly resized before attempting to install the update again. (LLM Synthesized)
